title: Zynga Poker
bullets: Zynga Poker is the world's most popular online Poker Game. Available on Facebook, iOS, Android and Kindle.
Technical Lead managing a team of 4-5 developers
Delivered many features using Unity/Flash/PHP including: Challenges, Leagues weekly Leaderboard, Lucky Bonus Slot Machine, VIP Center, and XP Progression
Replaced Flash web Game with Unity WebGL game in 2018
Core member of small team that rewrote legacy PHP backend in Go Microservices in 2019-2021, using the Nakama game server for multiplayer poker logic.
